title: Perfect Gift Sent As Gift Card
creator: Jifiti

extendedInfo.description: Shop your favorite stores and brands in the app or Scan those items in the physical store. Send any item as a gift directly to your friendâs phone or email. Your friend will receive a beautifully wrapped gift in their inbox with a gift card number which they can use online or in-store to redeem their gift. This app solves all your last minute gifting issues, the gift is sent instantly and you save on shipping. The best part is that you donât have to worry about shipping or the exact size, color or style of the gift youâre sending. Your friend will make all those decisions when he or she checks-out with their gift! Consider this the coolest mobile checkout known to man.Use Jifiti for Birthday Gifts, Holiday Gifts, Anniversaries, Sweet Sixteen's, Bar Mitzvah, Bat Mitzvah, Engagements, Bridal Showers, Baby Showers and any other gift giving event that comes to mind.Guess what. You can use Jifiti to start a registry and/or create your very own wishlist. It's just like Macy's, Target, Bed Bath and Beyond, Walmart or Bloomingdales only here you can choose items from any of the supported retailers. See list below.Spot something you love for yourself? Simply add it to your Jifiti wish list and share it with your friends and family for them to purchase or chip-in. You can also use Jifiti to manage a baby registry or wedding registry.List of supported stores:* Adidas * Aeropostale* Athleta* Banana Republic* Barnes & Noble* Body Shop* Brookstone* Build A Bear* Chefs* Coach* Columbia* Container Store* Crate & Barrel* GameStop* Gap* Gymboree* Home Depot* Hot Topic* Lands' End* Lids* Nike* Old Navy* Piperlime* Pottery Barn* Sears* Sephora * Sunglass hut* Sur La Table* The Body Shop* The Container Store* The Home Depot* The Limited* Torrid* Toys R Us* Williams SonomaKeep watching, we are constantly adding more stores!Read reviews of Jifiti:Jifiti has been mentioned alongside Google Glass as revolutionizing the way you shop:â¢	http://www.pcmag.com/article2/0,2817,2421498,00.asp Jifiti is on TechCrunch!â¢       http://techcrunch.com/2013/03/10/jifiti-lets-you-teleport-products-to-your-friends-sorta/â¢       http://techcrunch.com/2013/07/29/jifiti-raises-2-5-million-for-gifting-app-which-combines-thoughtful-shopping-with-the-convenience-of-a-gift-card/Jifiti relieves the stress of gifting and allows JOY to re-enter the arena - see Pando Dailyâ¢  http://pandodaily.com/2013/07/29/online-gifting-experiences-suck-jifiti-raises-2-5m-and-expands-nationwide-to-prove-they-dont-have-to/See Jifiti's reviews on Netted!â¢	http://netted.net/2012/12/05/a-lot-to-be-desired/#toggled

reviews.title: cool
reviews.comment: It\'s actually a nice app.I sent a gift to my friend in LA. She didn\'t receive the gift card within a few seconds but only after a few minutes. But maybe she only saw the emails a few minutes later so that\'s fine. Cool idea.

reviews.title: Interested once the bugs are worked out
reviews.comment: When I register using my email address, my profile doesn\'t have a name. This causes email sharing to insert \"null\" where my name should appear. The item I scanned has the correct price displayed in the app, but it shows $0 on the web page. The web page limits the maximum contribution to price of the item, so none can contribute because any contribution will exceed $0.
